name: Infinibowl
description:
Bowl to your heart's desire with unlimited bowling balls and two rows of infinite, moving pins! Get more bowl for your ball when aiming for several pins at once.

Credits

  • Salil T.: Programming, Game Design
  • Grace Ho: Game Design, Sprite Art, Visual and Auditory Polish

Made using crisp-game-lib.
